= notes =

 field: string '''.notes''' (Read/Write)

== Description ==
The '''notes''' field stores zone-specific documentation as a string.

== Field Access ==
{| class="wikitable"
! Access !! Type !! Description
|-
| Read || string || Returns the current notes text for the zone
|-
| Write || string || Sets the notes text for the zone
|}

== Availability ==
This field is available on the following unit types:
* zoneptr (Zone pointer)

== Examples ==
 dilbegin display_zone_notes(zone : zoneptr);
 code
 {
    exec("say Zone notes: " + zone.notes, self);
 } dilend

 dilbegin set_admin_notes();
 var
    admin_zone : zoneptr;
 code
 {
    admin_zone := findroom("admin@midgaard");
    if (admin_zone != null)
    {
       admin_zone.notes := "Administrative zone - restricted access";
       exec("say Notes updated.", self);
    }
 } dilend

== Usage Notes ==
* The '''notes''' field provides read/write access to zone notes
* Used for storing zone documentation, policies, or descriptive text
* Notes can contain multiple lines separated by newline characters
* Common uses include:
** Zone descriptions and instructions
** Administrative information
** Development status tracking
** Zone-specific rules or policies
* Notes are stored as plain text strings
* Use [[split]] function to process multi-line notes

== Error Handling ==
* Returns '''fail''' if zone pointer is null or invalid
* Returns '''error''' if accessed on an unsupported unit type
* Setting very long notes may cause memory issues
* Always validate zone pointer before accessing the notes field

== Related Functions/Fields ==
